text: The porridge was tasty but the century egg was added in before serving - not cooked together with the porridge. Rice grains were still quite whole and unbroken.

Ordered a pork porridge with egg, the egg was raw in the bowl and I would expect the porridge to be piping hot to cook the egg. But the porridge was just warm which I can put into my mouth without cooling it. I hope I don't get salmonella from it.

Pork congee has nice smooth texture. The taste is totally acceptable for my light taste bud. Their sliced pork are soft, tender, easy to chew. Pork meat balls are hand-made, very nice fresh. You- Tiao though i do not like.

I like both their porridge n noodles

Porridge has the old school taste

Noodles also cook al dente. Simple n nice.
Homely porridge, but tastes a bit bland. Portion is pretty filling with a lot of ingredients added in. Lovers of cantonese porridge should avoid this stall though.
